titles.title: Taxpayer Bill of Rights Resolution
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding a taxpayer bill of rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 6/27/2013--Introduced. Taxpayer Bill of Rights Resolution - Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that each taxpayer has the right to be informed, to be assisted, to be heard, to pay no more than the correct amount of tax, to an appeal, to certainty, to privacy, to confidentiality, to representation, and to a fair and just tax system.
